html:
7.30.17  9:59 pm   do u like trumpets 

     they are ok

7.30.17  8:40 pm   do you think our ears are already capable of fully understanding music harmony? is studying music theory "putting into words" what our ears already know?

     oh hell yeah

7.30.17  8:11 pm   have you ever set The Void on fire

     what is the void

7.30.17  7:33 pm   What's the most powerful magic spell in your arsenal?

     being normal

7.30.17  6:28 pm   Bill!!!! I WANT ANOTHER VIDEO FROM YOU! Don't take this the wrong way. I know you working as hard as you can, and I know how much work goes into each project.... BUT I WANT IT NOW!!! Can't you just get somebody to record a video of you working on different things, then edit them all together and sync the video up to a song (preferably a pop rock song from the 80's) so you can just montage your way through the rest of the work you have to do? 

     that does not sound like a video i would want to release nor have released under my name

7.30.17  5:53 pm   what's a spoon?

     it's like a bowl on a stick

7.30.17  5:38 pm   What pronoun should we use for East? It's not up down or out, is it in? Or over? Back!?

     i think those are prepositions

7.30.17  5:23 pm   Maybe the reason that things have unique qualities is so that we can pick which things are our favorites?... just sayin'.

     sure. then i guess once you've figured that out you can shut the game off and stop playing

7.30.17  5:21 pm   How can I tell if time is working properly?

     what do you think is the proper way for time to work

7.30.17  5:20 pm   sometimes i question you something and then i forget i did so. Can you give me a notice when you give me a answer?

     sure. where should i send the notification to

7.30.17  4:53 pm   Do you prefer A) either/or questions, B) yes/no questions, C) pick one, or D) neuanced ones?

     no

7.30.17  4:18 pm   Is anything better than anything else?

     yes, everything is better and worse than everything

7.30.17  3:36 pm   do you like clocks?

     yes

7.30.17  2:27 pm   how was alabama

     hot, warm, etc

7.30.17  2:06 pm   if you use "oh hell yeah" for things which you strongly agree with, what do you use for things you strongly disagree with? do you have one?

     sometimes i say 'absolutely not'

7.30.17  1:39 pm   Why are pants a thing?

     ah i see your point. i will delete them

7.30.17  12:11 pm   idea: put the random question button above the question so readers don't have to move their mouse for longer questions

     ok i made a different version just for you. this one doesn't seem as friendly for the mobile version, because your thumb gets in the way of the questions

7.30.17  11:12 am   i keep screaming but god wont answer

     the answer is you getting tired of screaming

7.30.17  6:35 am   will you do my science homework?

     right now i don't think i have time

7.30.17  4:44 am   i have a history question, i heard that ancient canaanites apparently weren't extirminated by isrealites and their descendants are modern day lebanese. isn't canaan closer to tunisia on the other side of the mediterranean,

     no

     how did this happen?

     canaan is like where israel/lebanon/palestine is. tunisia is on the other side of the mediterranean, in africa. or maybe there is another place called canaan there too, but the biblical canaan is right about where "the holy land" is (israel, palestine, lebanon, etc)

7.30.17  4:09 am   the internet is controlled largely by businesses who are tasked with getting consumers something they want to look at. you infiltrated this system in order to get noticed. but you really seem to hate participating in these systems.

     i disagree

     please tell me more about this relationship

     the internet is extremely important, useful, and fun. i'm not sure if that answers your question

7.30.17  4:08 am   how do you know we're alive?

     what alive means is what we are. unless you use a different language

7.30.17  3:05 am   What is your spirit animal?

     what the heck is a spirit animal

7.30.17  2:39 am   Do you think the universe wants to be noticed? 

     yes

7.30.17  2:34 am   What's a good waste of time?

     doing nothing

7.30.17  2:18 am   how do i make new friends

     join a cult

7.30.17  2:03 am   this questions page is crazy, which is cool, but does it ever get Too crazy for your liking

     yes

7.30.17  12:24 am   please cut this question in half

     i don't edit the questions

7.30.17  12:19 am   How do you remember the difference between blond and blonde?

     i don't think i know the difference

7.30.17  12:12 am   why did i trust myself to go a university where i didn't know anyone when i knew I didn't know how to make friends
?

     no one knows how to make friends

7.30.17  12:07 am   what's the craziest thing?

     everything is tied for craziest

7.30.17  12:03 am   how do i go about dismantling the patriarchy 

     just tap lightly

7.29.17  11:56 pm   After looking at the time gap between your last video before "History of the entire world, I guess." It seems like it took almost a year to do that video. . .

     that's right, it took 11 months

      How did you feel when you finished it?

     nice, very good

7.29.17  11:55 pm   do you think about D A R K  M A T T E R sometimes?

     i had to think about it a lot in the early stages of writing "history of the entire world, i guess" and i've basically concluded that 'dark matter' means 'we don't know.' the term 'dark matter' seems to be a temporary nominal place holder for whatever doesn't currently add up about the universe, particularly relating to gravity and the over all 'expansion' of the universe. i don't think anyone understands it well enough to actually say that it's 'matter' or 'energy'...... you might as well just call it space monsters for now

7.29.17  11:54 pm   Is the "I'm feeling randy" button a reference to the Austin Powers movies at all? (e.g. "Do I make you randy baby?")

     no, but the most recent time i enjoyed hearing the word 'randy' might be here

7.29.17  11:48 pm   You haven't posted a repeat question in a while. Reason?

      i've been developing a much more advanced way of dealing with that
7.29.17  11:48 pm   Do you do your own music?

7.29.17  11:46 pm   What exactly is racism?

     a bad sad game where anyone can lose, even if you're not playing

7.29.17  10:54 pm   what does 'is slef' mean?

     is self

7.29.17  10:40 pm   what's true?

     the reflexive property of equality

     i think clients can also have other customers? not sure

7.29.17  10:04 pm   what do you think of airports

     it's like a home. for planes!

7.29.17  9:52 pm   I'm bored. Anything to do?

      have some Problems

7.29.17  9:50 pm   "I'm feeling Randy"? What does that mean?

     i feel like viewing the questions randomly, one question at a time

7.29.17  8:58 pm   I was given a Canadian quarter the other day at work, and I noticed that it had Elizabeth II on it. what are they gonna do when the queen dies

     i think most money features dead people. i think every piece of currency in my country features a dead person. they are actually about to change one of them from a dead person to another dead person

7.29.17  8:26 pm   Why did hi I'm steve cut to black instead of fading out?

     there was another person who asked why another video used a fade instead of a hard cut. i wish i could get in touch with that person so the 2 of you could discuss it amongst yourselves

7.29.17  8:12 pm   Many people ask you about your favorites, but how come they don't ask about your least favorites as often?

     they ask about both, and neither is very constructive, because looking at the world in that way really kills the vibe for me

7.29.17  8:07 pm   Do you find journalling/documenting things useful?

     yes

      Do you find it informs what you make?

     sometimes

7.29.17  8:00 pm   What are you not doing right now?

     black magic

7.29.17  6:46 pm   who's your biggest inspiration in life?

     everyone is tied for first place
